text: Idioglossa thailandica is a species of moth of the family Batrachedridae. It is known from Kanchanaburi, Thailand. The wingspan is about 8 mm. The forewings of this species are chrome-yellowish, mottled with dark brownish scales and a silvery streak at one-fifth.Sugisima, K., 2004. A new Idioglossa species (Lepidoptera, Batrachedridae, Batrachedrinae) from Thailand. - Trans. Iepid S.oc. Jltpa n55 (1) 2:9-33 ==References== Category:Moths described in 2004 Category:Batrachedridae
title: Idioglossa thailandica
